title: Temporary Removal Of Liquidity For Buybacks
body:
Should the ICEBRK DAO allow the removal of 4.67% of the unlocked liquidity held by the IceBreak-R Deployer (7.02 wBNB + 18.8T ICEBRK) to allow for token buybacks generated from various yield farming strategies by the IceBreak-R team? These are LP tokens added since migration in June, generated through purely through token taxes.

The funds will initially be used to purchase Dark Energy Crystals for Splintershards airdrops daily, which would then in turn be sold off to fund the buyback & burning of ICEBRK tokens at an accelerated rate.

Removal of liquidity, especially this small of an amount, will have a very minor effect on price impact going forward but will NOT change the price simply by removing. These LP funds will eventually be returned in full to the project liquidity pool, within a period of 10 months.
author: 0x30bc20753b325C7F7B3e55daEB464C348C5e8096
